text.content:
Momentum

You gain a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.Effect: +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls]{+2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls} until the end of your next turn.

Bludgeoning

Blowback

The target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Piercing

Tangled

Crit Effect: You can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grapple] the target as a free action. This uses the same multiple attack penalty as your attack and doesn't count towards your multiple attack penalty.

Slashing

Pretty Colors

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] until the end of your next turn.

Bomb or Spell
